author: bencomic

right.text: yes, it's true, i am a furry, i am attracted to animals, yes, i'm attracted to aeris (the vgcats character that is also my userpic).

left.text: note: after this entry everyone will probably lose any respect they ever had for me, but i don't really care to be honest.

right.text: throw all the anti-furry insults you can think of at me. i don't give a fuck.

left.text: there, it's out. make fun of me all you want, i don't care what anyone says about me on the internet.
that's all, the truth is out. think and say what you want.

title: bencomic halloween special: "and watch vgcats in action"
